description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis- Learn Powerful Hypnotic Conversation Starters' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

Did this ever happen with you that you have been to be social gathering, you see a beautiful girl or a handsome boy, you desperately wish to talk to her or him but you do not know how to go ahead and what to talk? If this has ever happened with you, relax, you are not alone, this happens with many people.

Most of the people do not know how to break the ice and start a conversation. This course is designed to tell you very powerful hypnotic conversation starters to start a striking conversation with almost anyone in the world.

Hypnotic conversation starters are the powerful sentences and questions that spark the conversation and put your subject into light hypnotic trance. When you use these hypnotic conversation starters while communication with someone, you put that person into light state of hypnosis or hypnotic trance.

By the end of the course you will be able to break the ice easily with strangers at a social gathering or a party.

It is ideal for people who are into sales and marketing and require persuasion skills and convincing power to grow in their job and business and achieve their targets.

This course contains a lot of hypnotic exercises and more than 35 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English.
title: Hypnosis- Learn Powerful Hypnotic Conversation Starters
